# primaryAngle

**Instance Property**

A value that represents the angle the framework highlights if this lane is preferred or good.

## Declaration

```swift
var primaryAngle: Measurement<UnitAngle> { get set }
```

## Discussion

If `primaryAngle` is present it can’t be included in [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPLane/secondaryAngles].

## Properties

- **secondaryAngles**: A list of the remaining angles of this lane guidance.
- **status**: A value that describes the lane’s status.
